title: Definitions
context: D. Derivative Proceedings [ยง414-171] Definitions. As used in this subpart: &ldquo;Derivative proceeding&rdquo; means a civil suit in the right of a domestic corporation or, to the extent provided in section 414-178, in the right of a foreign corporation. &ldquo;Shareholder&rdquo; includes a beneficial owner whose shares are held in a voting trust or held by a nominee on the beneficial owner&rsquo;s behalf. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1]
